page.title: 13OLD INTO NEW
page.content: The Old Dairy,Pinkney Park was built in 1890 using local stone as main dairy for Estate.In 1981 the{Old {Dairy was converted}to accommodate 3 separate craft workshops. { 1 Restoration Unlimited}_specializes in restoring antique furniture,clocks china,& porcelain,oil & watercolour paintings. {2_Horsedrawn Ltd}specializes in restoration of all types of horsedrawn vehicles,designs and builds new carriages.Employs 4 full time staff, including 2 wheelwrights,1 metal worker & 1 coach painter. {3_Colin Henderson}_ handmade saddlery & harnesses,also hires out his own horses and carriages etc for films and TV.All 3 firms employ local young people on Government Training Schemes.
